          SPATS is the functional body of the Kalpana Chawla Space Technology Cell (KCSTC) which is the contact point of the Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) at IIT Kharagpur. It solely dedicated to Astronomy and Space technology. It also constitutes of astronomy club named "From Quarks TO Quasars " which aims to develop a theoretical approach towards cosmology and astronomy. We also conduct Space Technology Awareness Camp in different institutions of India which primarily aims to spread space awareness across the nation.Inside the campus, we conduct various sky gazing sessions witnessing a response of more than 1500 people, guest lectures, web talks, and quiz events. Each semester we distribute our official newsletter named MOON WALK throughout the campus.
